snippet: Hong Kong health officials have slaughtered thousands of chickens from mainland China and closed markets, after tests found some birds were infected with a strain of bird flu.
lead_paragraph: Hong Kong health officials have slaughtered thousands of chickens from mainland China and closed markets, after tests found some birds were infected with a strain of bird flu.

headline.main: Hong Kong Slaughters Chickens After an Outbreak of Bird Flu
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Slaughters Chickens After an Outbreak of Bird Flu
